content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to up-to-date information about how the Chicago Sun-Times has covered recent events such as political campaigns and natural disasters. However, in the past, the Chicago Sun-Times has covered important events extensively, providing in-depth coverage, analysis, and commentary.

For example, during the 2016 US Presidential election, the Chicago Sun-Times published a range of articles examining the campaign, the candidates and their policies, as well as analysis of polling data and predictions about the potential outcomes.

Similarly, during natural disasters such as Hurricane Katrina in 2005, the Chicago Sun-Times provided extensive coverage of the devastation and its aftermath, including on-the-ground reporting, human interest stories, and analysis of the government and emergency response.

Overall, the Chicago Sun-Times is known for its comprehensive coverage of major news events, offering readers a range of perspectives and analysis to help them understand the issues and make informed decisions.
